channel.title: Weird error on my client
channel.description:
If I compile my client (there's nothing wrong with the compiler it works on other clients),
then this shows up:
javac: file not found: *.java Useage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options Finished! Hit any button to continue...

item.title: Weird error on my client
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

It means the compiler cannot find any Java files in the folder directory in which the compiler is set to look in.

Read full topic
